name: Pix! - Virtual Pet Game
description:
Here they are! The PIX have come! The most CUTE TINY CREATURES that you have ever seen, and they are your first VIRTUAL PET. They will be always in your screen looking for your love! Adopt now your first PIX, you’ll fall in love with them!

With an adorable pixel art design, the PIX are hungry, dirty and… So lonely! Take care of them and adopt tons of Pix, contained aaaaall of them in the PIXBook! A magic book full of pixlove in which you will find all this pets and their evolutions. Everything at just “one tap” of distance! Isn’t it adorable? Easy, pretty, PIX!

The pix will be your daily mates. They will look at you with these cute loving eyes every time you open your smartphone… Awwww! You won’t be able to stop taking care of them, and besides, they are so affection-demanding! You will have to feed them, clean them, pet them, play with them... Keep your PIX happy!

Every PIX borns from an unique egg and you’ll never know what little buddy is going to appear, so you can find many different kinds of PIX, from a FURRY KITTY to a SOFT HAMSTER… Or maybe something more… SPECIAL… Who knows?!

The PIX actually grow up! If you take care of them and you give them all the love they can ask for (and trust us, they constantly ask for it), THEY WILL EVOLVE! Look how your new pet is growing from a tiny charming baby to SURPRISING AND CUTE ADULT!

*** GAME FEATURES ***

** The First Virtual Pet! Take care of them even without unlocking your smartphone or without exit your homescreen. They are always there for you! What a sweetie! **

** Take care of these cute pets everywhere! You will have to clean them, feed them, keep their home tidy, make them happy… PIX is a realistic pet simulator, perfect for kids and adults! **

** Get a new egg every time that your PIX gets older. Discover what PIX is hiding inside each one. From regular and common eggs, to legendary ones. Each PIX is more adorable than the previous! **

** COMPARE YOUR PIX WITH YOUR FRIENDS. Who has the most adorable one? Anyone has a legendary one? Play alone or together. Share your best moments with the world. All the people are PIX! **

** Accomplish the “PIXBOOK challenge”. Try to complete this magical books where you will find info of every single Pix. It’s kind a “encyclopedia of cuteness”! **

** Original retro PIXEL ART design that makes everything even more cute! You'll find yourself teleported to your childhood in a PIX! **

** Game in constant update. Thousand of NEW AMAZING PIX are coming to the town! **
